name: NFCTagReaderSession.PollingOption
desc: Options that determine the type of tags that a reader session should detect during a polling sequence.

items.name: static var iso14443: NFCTagReaderSession.PollingOption
items.desc: The option for detecting ISO 7816-compatible and MIFARE tags.

items.name: static var iso15693: NFCTagReaderSession.PollingOption
items.desc: The option for detecting ISO 15693 tags.

items.name: static var iso18092: NFCTagReaderSession.PollingOption
items.desc: The option for detecting FeliCa tags.
